channel.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [GRA, RBX, SBG, BHS / France, Canada][ Cisco ASA firewall] – Baremetal – Cisco ASA firewall – Planned Service End of Life
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 31, 10:00 - 11:00 UTC

Dec 6, 12:21 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC
Service impact : As part of the product lifecycle management we plan to end the baremetal service of Cisco ASA firewall by August 31, 2022. This service interruption will concern only the customers who have previously subscribed to this service.
OVHcloud will decommission the service so that you won’t be able to connect to your Cisco ASA firewall from that date.
Please make the appropriate backup of your data prior that date.
---------------------------------------------------
Heure de début : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC
Impact du service : Dans le cadre de la gestion du cycle de vie des produits, nous prévoyons de mettre fin au service baremetal du pare-feu Cisco ASA au 31 aout 2022. Cette interruption de service ne concernera que les clients qui ont précédemment souscrit à ce service.
OVHcloud mettra le service hors service de sorte que vous ne pourrez plus vous connecter à votre pare-feu Cisco ASA à partir de cette date.
Veuillez effectuer les sauvegardes appropriées de vos données avant cette date.

item.title: [GRA][BHS] [Data logs] Index backend migration
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jun 15, 12:00 - 15:00 UTC

Apr 15, 00:08 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 15/06/2022 12:00 UTC
End time : 15/06/2022 15:00 UTC
Service impact : No downtime expected in term of log ingestion, but ES API will not be available for a maximum time of two hours.
Service improvement: The indexation backend of Logs Data Platform will be replaced from Elasticsearch to OpenSearch.
Kibana instances will be replaced by OpenSearch Dashboards ones.

APIv6 calls related to ElasticSearch backend will be automatically redirected to new OpenSearch backend and will remain available until September 2022.

The following documentation : https://docs.ovh.com/fr/logs-data-platform/ will be updated few days before the migration.

item.title: [US][Dedicated Servers] - Custom OS templates installation
item.description:
Jun 9, 16:36 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 06/06/2022 21:30 UTC
End Time : 07/06/2022 16:02 UTC
Service impact : US customers weren't able to install custom OS templates on expatriate servers in CA or the EU.
Root cause : A bug in the API is at the origin of this degradation.

Jun 7, 16:02 UTC
Monitoring - Update : We keep the task under monitoring to ensure that the repair has restored service completely.

Jun 7, 14:30 UTC
Update - Update : A patch has been put in place, tests are currently underway. We will come back to you as soon as we have new information.

Jun 7, 10:40 UTC
Identified - Start time : 06/06/2022 21:30 UTC
Service impact : US customers may not be able to install custom OS templates on expatriate servers in CA or the EU.
Root cause : A bug in the API is at the origin of this degradation.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are in the process of correcting the problem. We will come back to you as soon as we see an improvement.

item.title: [RBX6][Dedicated Servers] - Rack 46C24/46C25
item.description:
Jun 9, 05:47 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 08/06 08:48 UTC
End Time : 09/06 05:25 UTC
Service impact : Dedicated servers back in service
Root cause :The incident was due to a problem with the cooling system.

Jun 9, 03:36 UTC
Update - Update : 90% of the servers are currently reachable on rack 46C24.

Jun 9, 02:41 UTC
Update - Update : 87% of the servers are currently reachable on rack 46C24.

Jun 9, 01:21 UTC
Update - Update : All servers on rack 45C25 are operational.
71% of the servers are reachable on rack 46C24.
Our teams are still working to restore the service on the remaining rack.

Jun 8, 22:04 UTC
Update - Update : 97% of the servers are reachable on rack 45C25.
42% of the servers are reachable on rack 46C24.
Our teams are still working to restore the service on the impacted racks.

Jun 8, 17:50 UTC
Update - Update : 85% of the servers are reachable on rack 46C25.
Our teams are still working to solve the problem of rack 46C24 and 46C25.

Jun 8, 13:35 UTC
Update - Update : 69% of the servers are reachable on rack 46C25.
Our teams are still working to solve the problem of rack 46C24 and 46C25.

Jun 8, 10:52 UTC
Update - Update : Repairs are underway and we will contact you as soon as our teams start to bring the servers back online.

Jun 8, 09:36 UTC
Update - Update : Our teams are currently removing all affected servers to begin repairs. In parallel, a repair of the cooling system is underway.

Jun 8, 09:11 UTC
Identified - Start time : 08/06 08:48 UTC
Service impact : Dedicated servers are electrically down
Root cause : The incident was due to a problem with the cooling system.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are on site to solve the problem as soon as possible. We will come back to you as soon as possible to keep you informed of the progress of the resolution.
